text: Hermanniellidae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are about 9 genera and at least 50 described species in Hermanniellidae. ==Genera== * Akansilvanus Fujikawa, 1993 * Ampullobates Grandjean, 1962 * Baloghacarus Mahunka, 1983 * Dicastribates J. & P. Balogh, 1988 * Hermanniella Berlese, 1908 * Hermannobates Hammer, 1961 * Issaniella Grandjean, 1962 * Mahunkobates Calugar, 1989 * Sacculobates Grandjean, 1962 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Hermanniellidae
